name: Persona AI Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of artificial intelligence assistants and personas designed to solve complex life challenges, enhance everyday routines, and just have fun. The company provides a suite of assistants that help with a variety of tasks, such as booking appointments, ordering groceries, making travel arrangements, and many more, enabling users to simplify their lives and get more done.
